Signing Up

Welcome to the location to sign up for Winter League 2022.

If you want to see more details about how the league is going to be run, choose the Home page or click the 3 lines on the top right (if you are on your phone).

Winter League 2022 Info

When

Dates: January 8th -> March 5th (League Tourney)

  • Saturdays from 9am-noon
  • 2 games every week!
  • Hanging out after!

Where

Use the following address: Smith Soccer Park: 2399 Veasley St, Greensboro, NC 27407

Who

You!

What (do you get)

  • 9 weeks of co-ed Ultimate (from January to March) first pull at 9am, playing to 15 or hard cap at 8pm.
  • 1 day tournament on a Saturday in March
  • A jersey with a snazzy logo
  • Friends!


Teams

Teams

Use the table below to find out what team you are on and who your captains are.

Schedules

Captains

We have four teams this year, with either one or two captains per team

But what does the logo look like?

Isn’t it cool? We think so. :)

Sign up Steps

Sign up

  1. Send money ($60) to Triad Ultimate via paypal or venmo
    • Venmo >> Link to account
      • Note: Must be logged in to venmo before clicking on link
      • Must also be accessed through your phone.
      • use username: “@Philip-Walker”
    • PayPal >> Link to paypal
      • use username: “Phillyfrilz”
      • Note: This account is associated with our league treasurer (Phil Walker), don’t be afraid, he’s super trustworthy.
  2. Please fill out the survey form below to help us understand your relative skill level.
  3. Wait eagerly for league to start.
    • You will be be contacted soon, the captains will be gathering to figure out how to best set up teams to ensure we all have a fun time this summer.

Instead of filling out the form below, you can also click on this link
